body:
### How to reproduce
1. I'm building bitcoin on WSL following [build-windows.md](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/cbb54e77a120a69fc6faaecbdc4cf93915afb89c/doc/build-windows.md) step by step.
2. Everything works fine until `make HOST=x86_64-w64-mingw32`
3. It prints errors, looks like something wrong with automake:
![build-error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6071887/32791271-9f7978de-c99b-11e7-9eb4-339241961014.PNG)

4. I'm trying install automake, but it says automake is already installed, and version is 1.15, not 1.14, don't know if this is the key.
![automake](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6071887/32792938-970d1dbe-c99f-11e7-9f72-7373f24da7c3.PNG)


### What version of bitcoin-core are you using?
commit id: `d8ac8932683d9dca2a79a33ae110717ccbd85fa3`

### Machine specs:
- OS: Windows 10 1709 16229.19 X64 WSL
- CPU: Intel Core i5-6200U
- RAM: 8G
- Disk size: 300G
- Disk Type (HD/SDD): SSD
title: Build bitcoin failed on WSL
